snippet: Under the threat of losing hundreds of millions of dollars in American aid, Afghan officials backed down in an argument that had threatened to drive up the cost of the Western military withdrawal.
lead_paragraph: Under the threat of losing hundreds of millions of dollars in American aid, Afghan officials backed down in an argument that had threatened to drive up the cost of the Western military withdrawal.

headline.main: Afghans Yield in Dispute With U.S. Over Stiff Fines for Cargo Shipments
headline.print_headline: Afghans Yield in Dispute With U.S. Over Stiff Fines for Cargo Shipments
